Easily create stylish grids

Usage

  • Use the $('#myGrid').Grid() jQuery plugin to extend functionality and offset scrollbars
  • The plugin accepts the following paramaters
    • onload callback function to excute once the plugin has loaded
    • infiniteScroll callback function to excute once user has scrolled to the buttom of the grid
